paper_abstract: We consider matrix-product codes [C(1)...C(S)] . A, where C(1),...,C(S) are nested linear codes and matrix A has full rank. We compute their minimum distance and provide a decoding algorithm when A is a non-singular by columns matrix. The decoding algorithm decodes up to half of the minimum distance.
paper_title: Construction and decoding of matrix-product codes from nested codes
